abstracts.cdata!:
The primary objective of the Solar
            Thermal Hybrid Project for Egypt is to increase the share of
            solar-based power in the Egyptian generation mix thereby
            contributing to the Government's aim of diversifying
            power production. This environmental assessment (EA)
            document evaluated impacts and suggests mitigation measures
            in the following areas : Egypt's policy, legal and
            administrative framework, national environmental standards
            and guidelines and compliance with the Bank's
            environmental operational safeguards directives; soil,
            geology, hydrology, topography and siesmicity of the region;
            underground aquifers; pumping facilities; plant water
            requirements; aquatic environment; aquatic ecology; flora
            and fauna; land use, landscape and visual impact; ambient
            air quality; climate and meteorology; natural and sensitive
            habitats; effects of pollutants on health; solid waste
            management; traffic and transport; soil and groundwater
            contamination; surface water quality; and finally,
            archeology, historic and cultural heritage finding;
            mitigation measures during construction and operation.
